name: Russian roulette
description:
background:
you are playing Russian roulette with your friends, but you are not a very honest person and want to know which cartridge is empty so that you know when to skip and you need to write such a program
Input:
Q-who will shoot
DC-drum contents
conditions:
if Q = enemy and DS = + return "dodged"
if DS = - then "wait"
if Q = you and DS = + return "shoot" otherwise "at yourself"
good luck and this is my first kata
